name: MeaslesTestsForMeaslesVirusByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Measles (Tests for measles virus by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Measles virus),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Measles virus culture/isolate;  LOINC search: "Measles virus (culture or isolate)"),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
